myTunes

myTunes.

Downloads in seconds, entertains forever.

Discover myTunes, the home of endless entertainment. Music, films and more come together here. It’s also where you can join myMusic and stream — or download and play offline — over 45 million songs, ad-free.

Music

45 million songs on all your devices.

Expand your listening experience with myMusic. If you have an myPhone or myPad, myMusic is already built in — just open the myMusic app and tap “Try it free”. Listen to your favourite music ad-free on all your devices, online or off. Start your free three-month trial and cancel anytime.

Start Your Trial Now
